plot outline: Radha Krishna is a honest police who is suspended frequently for his sincerity. He is given a crucial task by the DGP with a code name 'Operation Drug mafia' to curb drug sales in the pubs managed by politicians. Meanwhile four guys are lured in to the crime business with the promise of free drugs and money. One of them falls in love with Radha Krishna's sister Siri, but Radha Krishna is unaware of his identity.
title: Police Game
plot: Radha Krishna is a honest police who is suspended frequently for his sincerity. He is given a crucial task by the DGP with a code name 'Operation Drug mafia' to curb drug sales in the pubs managed by politicians. Meanwhile four guys are lured in to the crime business with the promise of free drugs and money. One of them falls in love with Radha Krishna's sister Siri, but Radha Krishna is unaware of his identity.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
